file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 36-12-02-04 - APU BLEED-AIR CHECK VALVE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL APU BLEED-AIR CHECK VALVE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the APU bleed-air check valve. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY APU BLEED-AIR CHECK VALVE - RE- ALL 36-12-02-000-801-A MOVAL APU BLEED-AIR CHECK VALVE - INSTAL- ALL 36-12-02-400-801-A LATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 36-12-02 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 36-12-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. APU BLEED-AIR CHECK VALVE - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to remove the APU bleed-air check valve. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Fuselage rear section I D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Aft electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A WARNING: DO NOT TOUCH THE BLEED-AIR SYSTEM DUCTS OR COMPONENTS IMMEDIATELY AFTER THE ENGINE OR APU STOPS BECAUSE OF THE HIGH BLEED-AIR TEMPERATURE. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 36-12-02 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CAUTION: WHEN YOU REMOVE THE VALVE, BE CAREFUL NOT TO LET ITS GASKETS FALL DOWN INTO THE AIRCRAFT. (1) Release the Marman V-clamp (3). (2) Remove the APU bleed-air check valve (4). (3) Remove and discard the gaskets (2) and (5). (4) Install the plastic plugs to the ducts (1) and (6). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 36-12-02 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL APU Bleed-Air Check Valve - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B 272DR A ZONE 272 GUIDE PIN (REF.) SLOT DET. A (REF.) 3 BLEED AIR CHECK VALVE AIR FLOW 1. DUCT FROM APU 2. GASKET TUBE 3. CLAMP 1 VERTICAL DET. B LINE 2 4. BLEED AIR CHECK VALVE 5. GASKET 6. DUCT AIR FLOW TO PAX CABIN 1 TORQUE: 6.8 - 7.3 N.m (60 - 65 lb.in). REFER TO TASK 20-10-10-910-801-A FOR CORRECT INSTALLATION OF V-CIAMPS. 2 THE BLEED AIR CHECK VALVE MUST BE INSTALLED WITH ITS FLAP SHAFT CENTER LINE POSITIONED ON THE VERTICAL LINE PRE-MOD S.B. 145-36-0011. 3 THE BLEED AIR CHECK VALVE MUST BE INSTALLED WITH ITS GUIDE PIN POSITIONED 145AMM360019.MCE D ON THE SLOT OF THE TUBE POS-MOD S. B. 145-36-0011. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 36-12-02 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 36-12-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. APU BLEED-AIR CHECK VALVE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to install the APU bleed-air check valve. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION 36-12-02 - AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM TASK 20-10-10-910-801-A/200 V-BAND CLAMPS - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Fuselage rear section I D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) Gasket 36-12-02 2 H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Aft electronic compartment I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A CAUTION: MAKE SURE THAT THE TUBES ARE CLEAN, WITHOUT DUST, SOLIDS, GREASE, ETC. (1) Remove the plastic plugs from the ducts (1) and (6). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 36-12-02 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Install the new gaskets (2) and (5). (3) Install the APU bleed-air check valve (4) with the arrow in the bleed-air-flow direction and in the vertical position. (4) Connect the APU bleed-air check valve to the ducts (1) and (6). CAUTION:REFER TO AMM TASK 20-10-10-910-801-A/200 FOR CORRECT INSTALLATION OF V-CLAMP. (5) Install the clamp (3). (6) Tighten the clamp (3) to the torque shown in (Figure 401). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 36-12-02 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
